caption: Alfred Eisenstaedt (1898–1995; born Tczew, Poland [Dirschau, West Prussia]; died Oak Bluffs, MA; active New York, NY), Balanchine’s American Ballet, NYC (Rest period for dancers), 1936, printed ca. 1950. Gelatin silver print; 16 × 24 cm (image), 18.2 × 25.2 cm (sheet). Gift of Alexander D. Stuart, Class of 1972, and Robin Stuart (2023-207)
